original_text: Solomon had four thousand stalls for horses and chariots, and twelve thousand horses, which he kept in the chariot cities and also with him in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 병거 메는 말의 외양간은 사천이요 마병은 만 이천 명이라 병거성에도 두고 예루살렘 왕에게도 두었으며

sentences.original_text: Solomon had four thousand stalls for horses
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 말들을 위한 사천개의 마구간을 가졌으며

sentences.original_text: which he kept in the chariot cities
and also with him in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또한 예루살렘에서 자신과 함께 두었다
